actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the price of propane.

summary.text: Directs the President, under the Economic Stabilization Act, to issue an order: (1) stabilizing wholesale and retail process of propane at prices to reflect cost charges related to propane production and distribution since January 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the price of propane.
